main event: On July 31, 1956, a civilian observer reported sighting a round object in the sky near Temple, Texas.
interesting points: The object was described as being one-fifth the size of the full moon and three or four times larger than Venus., It had a brilliant, milky white coloration similar to a fluorescent lamp., The object exhibited a speed equal to or greater than a jet aircraft., The observer noted that the object slowly dimmed and faded out without any explosion or breaking up., The observer compared the object to those seen in the 'Marianna' Case, claiming they looked exactly alike.
witness description: A civilian bookkeeper from Temple, Texas.
